author: Joanna Woodburn And Claire Wheaton
title: How do you self-isolate if you've lost your home in the bushfires?
description: The imperative to stay at home to follow social distancing measures has a cruel, complicated impact for the thousands of Australians whose homes burned during summer's catastrophic bushfires.
content:
Updated 
April 05, 2020 13:27:51
The imperative to stay at home and self-isolate has been complicated for the thousands of people whose houses were destroyed in the summer bushfires of 20192020.
